resources.string: You are being asked to take part in a research study. The purpose of this study is to detect patients with high risk of sepsis shock. By monitoring common vital signs of at-risk patients using non-intrusive methods and applying a machine-learning solution, a reasonably accurate automated system for detecting sepsis in the early stages can be developed. Consumer level wearables were tested to continuously collect and estimate various vitals. By applying machine learning to analyze trends in these vital signs leading up to the onset of sepsis, a prediction can be outputted for whether or not a patient is suspected to have sepsis as their vital signs are monitored.

You are being asked to take part in a research study. The purpose of this study is to detect patients with high risk of sepsis shock. By monitoring common vital signs of at-risk patients using non-intrusive methods and applying a machine-learning solution, a reasonably accurate automated system for detecting sepsis in the early stages can be developed. Consumer level wearables were tested to continuously collect and estimate various vitals. By applying machine learning to analyze trends in these vital signs leading up to the onset of sepsis, a prediction can be outputted for whether or not a patient is suspected to have sepsis as their vital signs are monitored.
